duck: Competence (human resources), a standardized requirement for an individual to properly perform a specific job
Core competency - A core competency is a concept in management theory originally advocated by CK Prahalad, and Gary Hamel, two business book writers.
Skill - A skill is the learned capacity to carry out pre-determined results often with the minimum outlay of time, energy, or both.
Communicative competence, the ability to speak and understand language.
competence definition: a sufficiency of means for the necessities and conveniences of life.
Competence (geology), the resistance of a rock against either erosion or deformation
Jurisdiction, the authority of a legal body to deal with and make pronouncements on legal matters and, by implication, to administer justice within a defined area of responsibility
Competence (biology), the ability of a cell to take up DNA
Competence (law), the mental capacity of an individual to participate in legal proceedings
Linguistic competence, the ability to speak and understand language.

Competency evaluation (law) - In the United States criminal justice system, a competency evaluation is an assessment of the ability of a defendant to understand and rationally participate in a court process.

wiki.text:
'Competence' may refer to:

*Competence (biology), the ability of a cell to take up DNA *Competence
(geology), the resistance of a rock against either erosion or deformation
*Competence (human resources), a standardized requirement for an individual to
properly perform a specific job *Competence (law), the mental capacity of an
individual to participate in legal proceedings **Competency evaluation (law)
*Jurisdiction, the authority of a legal body to deal with and make
pronouncements on legal matters and, by implication, to administer justice
within a defined area of responsibility *Linguistic competence, the ability to
speak and understand language. *Communicative competence, the ability to speak
and understand language.
